title: Work Seriously!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Ah, this chiffon fabric is so cute! I have to tell Ruby and You about it♪ Ah, this looks great too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>….Mari-san, did you forget what that computer is for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>For accessing wonderful informations all across the world~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Haah…. It’s for working on the next board meeting materials as the chairman, right? I’ve finished the part you asked me to do. If you don’t finish the rest, I won’t let you do club activities, Mari-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That would be a problem! Then let’s speedily finish it…. Wow, these files are so nostalgic~. During these times Dia is still….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ma~ri~san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No no! You shouldn’t make that kind of face, show me your cute smile, Dia♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Geez, you’re hopeless…. I was right to ask Kanan-san for help<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Kanan is coming here? Speaking of which, Kanan said that she has finished the “Hell Triathlon” training plan right! We should ask her about it! So next time when Kasumi comes again we….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ma~ri~sa~~n….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
